Title: Allows for principals to be remanded into custody for drug treatment where there is a risk of continued substance abuse
Summary: Allows for principals to be remanded into custody for drug treatment where there is a risk of continued substance abuse or the use of an opioid antagonist was required.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the criminal procedure law and the mental hygiene law, in relation to allowing for principals to be remanded into custody for drug treatment where there is a risk of continued substance abuse
